meanings.definition: The quality or state of being usable.
meanings.sent1: The usablenesses of the new software impressed the team.
meanings.sent2: The usablenesses of the tool were evident in its simplicity.
meanings.sent3: The usablenesses of the broken remote control were put to the test by the curious toddler.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity had a level of usablenesses that made her stand out in the art world.
meanings.sent5: The usablenesses of the invention revolutionized the industry.

meanings.definition: The extent to which something is able to be used or operated effectively.
meanings.sent1: The usablenesses of the manual were questioned due to its complexity.
meanings.sent2: The usablenesses of the phone were evident in its user-friendly design.
meanings.sent3: The usablenesses of the old typewriter were put to the test by the aspiring writer.
meanings.sent4: His patience had a level of usablenesses that helped him navigate difficult situations.
meanings.sent5: The usablenesses of the map were crucial for the hikers to find their way.

meanings.definition: The practicality or usefulness of something.
meanings.sent1: The usablenesses of the kitchen gadget made cooking easier.
meanings.sent2: The usablenesses of the advice were appreciated by all.
meanings.sent3: The usablenesses of the umbrella hat brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had a level of usablenesses that made her a beloved friend.
meanings.sent5: The usablenesses of the new technique improved efficiency in the workplace.
